narrative:
*   This is a focused inspection limited to the two dogs cited under veterinary care section 2.40 b 2 as a direct
noncompliance on the January 15, 2015 inspection report.  The two dogs ( microchip numbers 104 791 820 and
109 831 779 )  were examined by a licensed veterinarian on January 15, 2015 ( 109 831 779 ) and on January 17,
2015 ( 104 791 820 ).   Proper documentation was provided by the licensee.
* The focused inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee. 
.
